item.title: Paperchain Listens, June 2018
item.description: Check out the music the Paperchain team were going through in June. Follow us on Spotify and listen to the tracks below. Harmonium in the Well, Nils Frahm Caparica, Populous Get Money, Madlib You Must Believe In Spring, Bill Evans Where Are You, Sonny Rollins The Feeling When You Walk Away, Yves Tumor Over and Out, Nine Inch Nails

Zoë Kravitz), Janelle Monáe, Zoë Kravitz This Is America, Childish Gambino Snowflake 3, Yagya Metropolis, 36 Tape Screen Triangles, the fun years

item.title: Paperchain featured in Billboard discussing streaming services, mechanical royalties and NOIs
item.description: Paperchain founder Daniel Dewar was featured in Robert Levine’s latest Billboard article, “Death By a Thousand Papercuts: How Streaming Services Protect Themselves From Lawsuits by Burying the Copyright Office in Paperwork”.
